content: “Everything should be made as simple as possible, but not simpler”

LoronsoDev/GameEngine2Second version of my yet-unnamed game engine. Can support 3D and 2D. Implements Bullet Physics for 3D and Box2D for 2D development. This engine is highly commented and valuable as a learning tool. It is not being worked on.C++ 00Nunc non leo non magna # Nunc non leo non magna ornare condimentum.
